sentences.en: A casual observer would have taken them to be three men out for an evening stroll.
sentences.cn: 乍一看的话，还以为他们三人是晚上出来散步的。

sentences.en: And the senstive observer of sculpture must learn to feel shape simply as shape, not as description or reminiscence.
sentences.cn: 雕塑品的敏锐观赏家必须学会把形体当作形体去感觉, 而不当作描述或联想去感觉.

sentences.en: As an impartial observer my analysis is supposed to be objective.
sentences.cn: 作为中立的观察员，我的分析应该客观。

sentences.en: Even a casual observer could hardly have failed to notice the heightening of an already tense atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 即便是不经意的旁观者也一定已经觉察到本就紧张的气氛进一步加剧了。

sentences.en: If you'd like my own opinion as an independent observer -- "
sentences.cn: 伯翁容我参加一些第三者的意见, —— ”

sentences.en: Inevitably, the observer of growth is impressed with the variety of responses.
sentences.cn: 研究生长的人不可避免地易被种种反应所吸引.

sentences.en: Observers are predicting a fall in interest rates.
sentences.cn: 观察员预测利率会下降。

sentences.en: Of particular importance to the observer is the position of the terminator.
sentences.cn: 对于观测者特别重要的是明暗界线的位置.

sentences.en: The Observer found the play "a feeble rehash of familiar Miller themes"
sentences.cn: 《观察家报》认为这部剧“是大家熟悉的米勒式主题的拙劣翻版”。

sentences.en: The observer should always make full notes about the atmospheric conditions.
sentences.cn: 观测者要对大气条件作详细记录.

sentences.en: The old man was sent along as an observer.
sentences.cn: 那个老人被派作观察员.

sentences.en: The painting depicted a hall so lifelike that a casual observer might believe himself to be looking through an open door.
sentences.cn: 这幅画描绘的厅堂如此逼真，若不细看，还真以为是从一扇开着的门往里看呢。

sentences.en: The part of the spectrum which is visible depends on the eyes of the observer.
sentences.cn: 谱中可见的部分取决于观察者的眼睛.

sentences.en: The technique of the drawing depends on the ability of the observer.
sentences.cn: 绘图技术取决于观测者的能力.

sentences.en: There is a lengthy article on Spike Milligan in the Observer newspaper.
sentences.cn: 《观察家报》上有一篇关于斯派克·米利根的长篇文章。

words.tran_cn: 显著的；觉察得到的；看得见的
善于观察的；机警的；严格遵守的
观察的；注意的；观察力敏锐的
[物] 可观察量；感觉到的事物
观察；遵守；注意到（observe的过去分词形式）
观察；遵守；说；注意到；评论
观众,目击者,调查者,观光者

trans.tran_cn: 遵守者，观察者，观察团，观察员
trans.tran_en: someone who regularly watches or pays attention to particular things, events, situations etc
